Even more so than film, games were the passion. Manor Lords would be perfect for them.
 
Read more
articles.title: What did a medieval peasant’s raw, sour breath sound like? Manor Lords’ composers tell us

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
This news post leaves me in a quandary, readers, because I will need to write a swear word for the sake of full journalistic transparency, but Google’s algorithms tend to frown on sweary articles. On the other hand, Google’s algorithms don’t like it when you spend whole intros handwringing about Google’s algorithms, either, so let’s stop, er, faffing around and speak of Doom. Id Software parent company Zenimax recently trademarked “IDKFA”, a string of letters that will be of deep significance to original Doom players, and which may therefore be evidence of an impending announcement.
 Read more
articles.title: New Doom reveal hinted at by Zenimax trademark

articles.author: Alice Bell
articles.description:
Like with getting fancy polyhedral dice sets full of all glitter and wool, buying and owning are two different hobbies when it comes to books. I think this has gotten worse (if that's the word?) with the increasingly popularity of BookTok, the book-centric community on TikTok. It's really mobilised young people towards reading (which is good) but in some cases drives a consumption for consumption's sake approach, where one must have read new books to talk about, one must take no breaths between reading, and one must read an astonishing number of books in the smallest amount of time possible (which I think is bad).
Read more
articles.title: I need someone to make a video game for me, specifically, about prioritising my pile of unread books

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Satrapa)
articles.description: Součástí odborných textů běžně bývají ukázky programového kódu či konfiguračních souborů. Nejčastěji bývají sázeny neproporcionálním písmem, ale jsou i jiné možnosti. Pojďme se podívat, co v této oblasti nabízí LaTeX.
articles.title: Sazba zdrojových kódů v LaTeXu: balík fancyvrb

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Na články o AOT překladačích (mypyc a Cython) i o JIT překladačích (Numba) dnes navážeme a celé téma dokončíme. Popíšeme si totiž některé možnosti nabízené AOT překladačem nazvaným Nuitka.
articles.title: Nuitka: pokročilý AOT překladač jazyka Python

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Lukáš Liebzeit)
articles.description: Tento článek pojednává o knihovně nlohmann/json, která přináší formát JSON do C++. Formát JSON je textový formát pro zápis dat. Díky tomu může sloužit pro přenos dat mezi komponentami bez ohledu na technologii.
articles.title: Pohodlná práce s formátem JSON v C++ díky knihovně nlohmann/json

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Sonda do světa otevřeného softwaru. Dnes si zajamujeme online, vyzkoušíme prohlížeč postavený na Firefoxu, uděláme si pořádek v záložkách a přehrajeme si hudbu ze služby TIDAL.
articles.title: Softwarová sklizeň (22. 5. 2024): založte kapelu a hrajte přes internet

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Michal Tauchman)
articles.description: V jednom ze svých projektů jsem se věnoval počítači Commodore 64, který je jedním z nejslavnějších a nejprodávanějších osmibitů na světě. Vynechal jsem ovšem disketovou mechaniku, kterou jsem tehdy ještě neměl v ruce.
articles.title: Druhé zastavení u počítače Commodore 64: disketová mechanika 1541-II

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Cython je AOT překladač Pythonu, který nově podporuje jak původní syntaxi nástrojů Cython/Pyrex, tak i zápis s dekorátory a typovými informacemi kompatibilní s Pythonem. Právě touto problematikou se budeme zabývat.
articles.title: Nástroj Cython a typové anotace podporované Pythonem

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: CESNET CERTS)
articles.description: Google opravuje zraniteľnosti v Chrome, kyberšpionáž ohrozuje diplomatické misie, Mirai botnet sa rozširuje, útok Spectre má svojho nástupcu, niekoľko bitcoinov sa stratilo v Indii a Android posiluje bezpečnosť.
articles.title: Postřehy z bezpečnosti: neoprávnené sledovanie diplomatických misií

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Projekt UBports chystá nový mobilní webový prohlížeč s lepší podporou multimédií. Společnost Red Hat se zapojí do vývoje rozsáhlých jazykových modelů (LLM). Kdysi populární hudební přehrávač Winamp otevře zdrojový kód.
articles.title: UBports chystá nový prohlížeč, Red Hat se zapojí do vývoje LLM

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: GCC 15 už bez Intel Xeon Phi, KDE s lépe vypadajícími KDE aplikacemi v GNOME, PipeWire 1.2 a asynchronní zpracování či podpora Snapu, Wine 9.9 s lepší podporou ARM a bez zastaralých částí WineD3D.
articles.title: AMD a SuperMicro za otevřené firmwary, 256jádrový ARM od Ampere příští rok

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: GPU novinky ARM Panthor, AMD s RDNA3+, Intel a Xe2/Lunar Lake, ovladač NTSYNC pro rychlejší Wine/Proton až v Linuxu 6.11, rozvíjející se podpora SoC Qualcomm Snapdragon X Elite.
articles.title: Novinky pro Linux 6.10: lepší FireWire či next-gen GPU Intel

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Od dnešního rána nefunguje vyhledávač Microsoftu Bing (downdetector). Kvůli tomu vyhledávač DuckDuckGo (downdetector) nevrací žádné výsledky, protože  používá výsledky Bingu. Stejně tak nefunguje vyhledávání internetu v ChatGPT-4.
articles.title: Nefunguje Bing, Copilot, DuckDuckGo a ChatGPT - aktualizováno

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Byť je s námi USB už čtvrt století, stále jsou používány mnohé tiskárny a jiná zařízení připojované přes LPT, tedy paralelní port. Greg Kroah-Hartman tak mezi změny USB/Thunderbolt subsystému příští verze jádra začleňuje i patche, které přidávají nový ovladač pro další čip obsažený v adaptérech z USB na LPT.
articles.title: Linux 6.10 přinese nový ovladač pro další USB-LPT adaptéry

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Po půl roce od předchozího vydání byla uvolněna nová pravidelná verze linuxové distribuce Alpine Linux, tentokrát s označením 3.20.0. Hlavní novinkou je tentokrát přidání podpory pro 64bitovou architekturu RISC-V. Seznam všech důležitých změn najdete v poznámkách k vydání.
articles.title: Alpine Linux 3.20.0 přidává podporu pro 64bitovou architekturu RISC-V

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Ink)
articles.description: Společnost JetBrains vydala první oficiální verzi IDE pro jazyk Rust s názvem RustRover. Pro nekomerční použití je základní verze k dispozici zdarma.
articles.title: Vyšla první ostrá verze vývojového nástroje RustRover

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Necelý rok po vydání verze 3.4 přichází na svět nová verze grafického prostředí IceWM 3.5. Novinky mimo jiné zahrnují novou předvolbu -i / --install umožňující instalovat extra témata vzhledu. Nechybí doplňování argumentů názvů souborů v adresním řádku, nové příkazy cd a pwd tamtéž.
articles.title: IceWM 3.5 přináší dílčí vylepšení či lepší českou a slovenskou lokalizaci

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Linuxových systémů přibývá, každý den se spouštějí nové servery a někdo se o ně musí starat. To znamená spoustu různých dovedností specifických právě pro linuxové prostředí. Jak to zprovoznit, kudy bezpečně dovnitř, co tam najdeme, jak se o to postaráme a jak to nastavíme nebo rozšíříme.
articles.title: Naučte se používat Linux správně a bezpečně (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Z jádra pomalu mizí zastaralý souborový systém ReiserFS a dostává poslední patche. Žádost o začlenění jedné konkrétní změny byla napsána v ruce ve věznici, kde si Hans stále odpykává mnohaletý trest za vraždu své manželky. „Patch“, který na základě informací od Hanse připravil Jan Kára ze SUSE, je velmi smířlivý a žádá přidání několika vývojářů do credits a naopak odstranění dřívějších komentářů k těmto osobám.
articles.title: Linux 6.10 přinese poslední smířlivý patch Hanse Reisera pro ReiserFS

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Do jádra verze 6.10 míří další patche vylepšující podporu ARM SoC Qualcomm Snapdragon X Elite, tentokrát zaměřené na jeho grafický výstup typu DisplayPort, resp. eDP. Aktualizace pro fyzickou vrstvu v podobě patchů již čeká začlenění.
articles.title: Podpora DisplayPortu u Snapdragonu X Elite v Linuxu 6.10

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Mezi alternativní varianty Fedory se s vydáním verze 41 zařadí i Miracle, tedy verze s Wayland kompozitorem založeným na Miru a podporujícím dlaždicový desktop á la i3. Vše již schválila FESCo (Fedora Engineering and Steering Committee), zhruba měsíc poté, co se návrh objevil.
articles.title: Schváleno, Fedora 41 i v provedení Miracle Spin

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Na světě je nová verze video konvertoru HandBrake. Verze 1.8.0 přináší řadu novinek ve všech oblastech, mimo jiné s ní jde muxovat VP9 a FLAC v rámci kontejneru MP4. V oblasti videa přibyla podpora kodéru FFV1 (včetně profilu „Preservation FFV1“), podporu s konstantní kvalitou u víceprůchodového kódování VP9. V kodéru SVT-AV1 je podporováno předávání dynamických metadat HDR formátu Dolby Vision. Zrychluje filtr decomb.
articles.title: HandBrake 1.8.0 vylepšuje podporu Dolby Video či TrueHD

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Dorka Volavkova)
articles.description: Registrace na open source konferenci DevConf.cz 2024 je otevřena. Konference se bude konat 13. až 15. června v prostorách Fakulty informačních technologií VUT v Brně.
articles.title: DevConf.CZ 2024 zveřejnil program a spustil registraci

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Společnost Codean Labs objevila vážnou zranitelnost v prohlížečce PDF integrované ve Firefoxu. Chyba umožňuje útočníkovi spustit libovolný kód v jazyce JavaScript, jakmile je otevřen škodlivý soubor PDF. Chyba se vyskytuje v PDF.js, kterou používá Firefox, ale také dalších nástrojů, které tuto knihovnu volají třeba kvůli náhledům.
articles.title: Firefox má vážnou zranitelnost v PDF.js, která umožňuje spustit cizí kód

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Rafael Sadowski na začátku letošního roku oznámil, že se do vývojové větve OpenBSD podařilo portovat KDE Plasma Desktop. V dubnu pak vyšlo OpenBSD 7.5, které uživatelům nabídlo KDE Plasma 5.27.10. Práce tím ale neskončily a Rafael nyní oznámil portaci KDE 6 do OpenBSD-current.
articles.title: KDE 6 je součástí vývojové větve OpenBSD

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Ubuntu v pátek zveřejnilo plány pro Ubuntu 24.10 Oracular Oriole. Pro toto vydání se počítá se šifrováním disku s heslem v TPM. Pokračuje integrace Flutteru pro nové desktopové aplikace a Flutter bude přecházet z GTK3 na GTK4.
articles.title: Plány pro Ubuntu 24.10 Oracular Oriole: bude mít zapnutý Wayland pro uživatele s NVIDIA

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: NFS (Network File System) je tu s námi již od roku 1984 s stále se používá. Jeho serverová i klientská část jsou implementovány přímo v linuxovém jádře. Tradičně se NFS nastavuje pomocí /etc/exports a  /etc/nfs.conf.
articles.title: S jádrem 6.10 půjde NFS konfigurovat pomocí nfsdctl

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: MichalVaclavik)
articles.description: Zaujímá vás, aké funkcionality prináša prichádzajúca LTS verzia Zabbixu 7.0? V stredu 22. mája (května) od 10:00 do 12:00 na bezplatnom webinári vám svoje znalosti o nadchádzajúcom vidaní novej verzie predstaví skúsený a certifikovaný tréner Marek Konečný.
articles.title: Webinár zdarma: posledná sada noviniek pokročilého monitoringu Zabbix pre verziu 7.0

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Server Information is beautiful přinesl pěkný obrázek ve formě teplotní mapy (světlejší barva odpovídá větší četnosti). Na obrázku jsou všechny kombinace čtyřmístných PIN, které se používají například k přístupu k mobilnímu telefonu, kreditní kartě a jednoduchým zámkům.
articles.title: Nejčastější PIN je 1234, detaily ukazuje teplotní mapa

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Damien Miller zahájil v kódu OpenSSH proces rozdělení sshd na více binárních souborů. V prvním kroku se sshd rozdělí na binárky obsahující zvlášť listener a obsluhu uživatelských relací. V plánu jsou ještě další rozdělení na menší bezpečnější celky.
articles.title: Démon sshd se rozdělí do několika binárek

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jirik)
articles.description: Vyšla verze 0.14.1 mikrojádrového operačního sytému HelenOS. Do hlavního panelu přibyla nabídka Start pro spouštění aplikací. Nabídku Start lze upravovat pomocí konfiguračního dialogu. Konečně je možné minimalizovat okna a spravovat je (minimalizovat, maximalizovat, zavřít) pomocí systémové nabídky v levém horním rohu okna.
articles.title: HelenOS 0.14.1 má nabídku Start

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Robert Heath Dennard pracoval jako výzkumník v IBM. V roce 1966 vynalezl paměťovou buňku sestávající z jednoho tranzistoru a kondenzátoru, což je základ moderních pamětí DRAM.
articles.title: Ve věku 91 zemřel vynálezce DRAM Robert H. Dennard

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: VPN umožňuje bezpečně propojit různá zařízení pomocí šifrovaných tunelů. Umožňuje také zapojit uživatele do vnitřní sítě přes zabezpečený přístupový bod. Na školení si prakticky ukážeme, jak to celé nastavit a zprovoznit pomocí nejnovějšího protokolu WireGuard.
articles.title: WireGuard: nasazujeme VPN rychle a jednoduše (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Dlouhou dobu platilo, že zařízení s Androidem mají velmi krátkou dobu podpory. V lepším případě jste mohli počítat se třemi lety aktualizací, což je dnes opravdu málo a často to uměle nutilo poctivé uživatele měnit naprosto funkční a technicky dostatečně vybavený telefon. To se naštěstí postupně mění a novým standardem je číslo sedm.
articles.title: Android vám vydrží sedm let, Google a Samsung posouvají dobu podpory

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: SSD disky trpí na Write Amplification (WA), který může zkrátit jejich dobu života. Od roku 1991 se proti WA používal overprovisioning. Od roku 2008 pak TRIM. Nové řešení se jmenuje FDP (Flexible Data Placement). Ten umožňuje operačnímu systému naznačit, na které místo data zapsat a tím zmírnit WA.
articles.title: Linux bude podporovat FDP (Flexible Data Placement) pro NVMe

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Přispěvatelé NetBSD mají nyní zakázáno používat jakýkoli kód generovaný pomocí ChatGPT, CoPilot nebo jiných nástrojů umělé inteligence. Pokud odevzdáváte kód, který jste sami nenapsali, zkontrolujte, zda licence tohoto kódu umožňuje import do zdrojového repozitáře NetBSD a volné šíření, uvádí se v aktualizovaných pravidlech NetBSD pro přispívání.
articles.title: NetBSD zakazuje přispívat zdrojovým kódem generovaným umělou inteligencí

AMD has now solidified its positioning for entry-level servers with the introduction of the EPYC 4004 series processors. The EPYC 4004 series is derived from the Ryzen 7000 series offerings to facilitate cost conscious server options and putting the Intel Xeon E-2400 series in the crosshairs. In this review is a look at the EPYC 4004 series along with benchmarks of nearly the entire EPYC 4004 product stack compared to Intel's current top-end Xeon E-2400 series processor, the Intel Xeon E-2488 Raptor Lake.

articles.description:
Dailies are a mainstay in many gacha games. In Wuthering Waves, you can complete your dailies to get your hands on important resources and rewards. 


How to unlock and complete Dailies in Wuthering Waves


To unlock Dailies in Wuthering Waves, you will need to play until the end of Act 1 Part 3, and finish that story mission completely. Once it is done, you will get access to the Dailies in your Guidebook as part of the Activity Tracker. I will not drop any spoilers on the quest, as it is a lot of fun and important to the story.


Dailies are small, normally pretty easy, world-building quests that you can complete in Wuthering Waves. They might also be simple things that you will need to do in your menu. The difference between them is that the first are called Daily Quests, and the second…
articles.title: How to unlock and complete Dailies in Wuthering Waves

Below, we'll outline the FFXIV 2024 calendar's confirmed and tentative event schedule — along with some events that may have wrapped up for the year. Additionally, you can check out the MMO's usual calendar too, along with a little explainer on each of the year's festivities. 


The FFXIV 2024 event calendar


It’s hard to give an exact date for every event, as the timing changes a little every year, and there’s no guessing when irregular events (such as The Maiden’s Rhapsody) may return. That being said, there a…
articles.title: Every seasonal FFXIV event, ongoing and scheduled for 2024

articles.author: Madison Benson
articles.description:
Wuthering Waves is a game you can enjoy alone in a solo world or alongside friends as a co-op playthrough. However, adding friends isn't as easy as adding their character's display name, as you need a specific ID before initiating the request. 


How to add friends in Wuthering Waves


Below are the exact steps to use for adding friends in Wuthering Waves:



Open your in-game menu and select Friends.


Select Add Friend and type in their user ID.


Wait for them to accept your request.



Screenshot by Destructoid


Once your friend finds their unique ID and shows it to you, you can add them as a friend, allowing them to join your world and adventure alongside you. However, unlocking co-op play requires progressing through a portion of the main storyline, so you won't be able to join others immediately. Advancing this far takes around two to three hours if you're playing at a casual pace.


What is User ID (UID) in Wuthering Waves?


Your UID is the unique identifier Wuthering Waves uses to differentiate you from other players. Everyone has a unique user ID, meaning yours will never be the same as someone else's. 


Screenshot by Destructoid


You can find your user ID by heading into your main menu under your character name. Alternatively, you can see it in the bottom corner of your screen while you're playing the game. If you want someone to add you as a friend, you can send them this ID for them to add. Similarly, if you want to add someone, this is the number they'll have to give for you to send a friend request.

The post How to add friends in Wuthering Waves appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to add friends in Wuthering Waves

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
You knew that red Skull Gem of Flavio’s was going to come in handy at some point in Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door, and here it is. During Chapter 5, you find a skull-shaped door and it seems like the skull-shaped gem might have something to do with unlocking it. Convince Flavio to hand it over, and you’ll meet with the ‘Stache Brothers Red and Blue.


To reiterate, this all happens in Chapter 5. About halfway through the chapter, you’ll find the skull door. Eventually, you’ll return to Flavio who will follow you back across the island to see it for himself. You can then convince him to borrow the skull. It slots into the door, and the ‘Stache Brothers Red and Blue rise from the ground.


The hint for completing this is in Flavio’s song, which he will helpfully start singing soon after the ‘Stache Brothers’ appearance.


Screenshot by Destructoid


The song first mentions Red ‘Stache “landing on his end” three times. What this means is that you need to jump on top of the pillar with the red mustache and do a spin jump (ground pound) three times.


You’ll then need to move to Blue ‘Stache. The song says he’s whacked four times on the belly. That simply tells you to hit it in the face three times with your hammer.


The skull door will then (partially) open. Grab Admiral Bobbery and toss him up on the ledge that opened. He’ll walk in and detonate, blowing the door open.


Flavio will mourn the loss of his treasured Skull Gem, but it is quickly returned to him.

The post How to solve the ‘Stache Brothers Red and Blue puzzle in Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to solve the ‘Stache Brothers Red and Blue puzzle in Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door

articles.description:
In Wuthering Waves' overworld, you'll occasionally spot resources known as Sonance Caskets. Picking up your first casket initiates the Remnants of the Past Days quest, introducing the Casket Delivery system and unlocking another way to get valuable items.  


Where to turn in Sonance Casket in Wuthering Waves


Once you pick up your first Sonance Casket and start the Remnants of the Past Days quest, you'll need to head to Jinzhou and speak to the local relic merchant, Chenpi. You'll visit this city during the main storyline, but if you've ventured past it, you can fast-travel to the Resonance Nexus and visit the quest marker. 


After speaking to Chenpi, you'll give him the Sonance Casket, where he'll explain the item is and its purpose. Doing this introduces the Casket Delivery service, which, in exchange for Sonance Caskets, you'll receive items such as Astrite, Lustrous Tide, and EXP potions, among other valuables. Each delivery level requires more Sonance Caskets, so you'll need to keep an eye out for these items during your travels before giving them to Chenpi and receiving each reward tier.


All Sonance Casket locations in Wuthering Waves


There are 139 known Sonance Casket locations in Wuthering Waves. They are all over the map, from inside Jinzhou city to end-game regions. Below is a map of every Sonance Casket location:


Image via Wuthering.gg Interactive Map


In other words, you likely won't max out your Casket Delivery levels for a while. Nonetheless, stopping in major cities will often net you a few if you look out for them, with the overworld having plenty more to watch for during your travels.

The post How to use Sonance Casket in Wuthering Waves appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to use Sonance Casket in Wuthering Waves

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
Focus Entertainment and Auroch Digital have announced that there’s a (paid) DLC expansion incoming for 2023’s Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun. Forges of Corruption will feature new enemies, weapons, and environments, and it’s coming June 18, 2024 to PC and Consoles.


Warhammer 40K: Boltgun was pretty far off from being my favorite game of 2023. In particular, my biggest issue with it was its confusing and weak level design. However, it still left a big impact on me. Its weapon sound effects are incredible and being a big, stompy-legged war machine felt great. Despite all its problems, I still felt the need to recommend it.




In fact, I’m definitely interested in this DLC. Beyond giving the developers a chance at highlighting the gameplay with some (hopefully) better level design, I’m excited to see whatever new weapons get thrown our way. To be specific, they’re adding the Multi-Melta and Missile Launcher. Boltgun didn’t have a missile launcher already? I can’t remember. I suppose the eponymous Boltgun is technically a rocket launcher already, as explained to me by a reader.


The Forges of Corruption campaign will take us back to Graia, which is a bit of a shame since I’d rather see something that isn’t just one big industrial planet. The new enemies you’ll be facing are the Helbrute and the Terminator.


On top of but separate from the upcoming DLC, Auroch Digital is also adding a horde mode. A staple of the modern FPS, horde mode has you facing off against endless waves of enemies. The horde mode will be free to all players, whether they purchase the DLC or not.


Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun is available for PC, Switch, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X|S. Forges of Corruption releases on June 18, 2024.

The post Warhammer 40K Boltgun: Forges of Corruption DLC gives new reason to reload in June appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Warhammer 40K Boltgun: Forges of Corruption DLC gives new reason to reload in June

articles.author: Shawn Robinson
articles.description:
Hellblade 2 is almost entirely a linear experience. Barring some slight changes in how you tackle combat or how quickly you solve puzzles, each player gets from point A to point B in the same way.  That is, except for one specific moment near the end of the game. Here's whether you should help Fargrimr or Astridr in Hellblade 2.


Should you go with Fargrimr or Astridr in Hellblade 2?


This choice appears when proceeding through the Jarnvior forest near the end of Hellblade 2. As you progress, you'll link back up with your companions who are experiencing their deepest fears come to life. Senua partially helps both Fargrimr and Astridr with their issues, but then comes upon a crossroads where she must choose who to help. The one who's lost his way, or the one who fears what can't die by the blade.


While this may seem like a big choice, who you choose here doesn't affect the main story in any meaningful way. You'll help one of them navigate the forest for a few moments before finding the other down the path, shaken up but no worse for wear. After meeting up with Thorgestr, the story proceeds as if the choice never came up.


While it is a little sad that neither choice matters, it's likely Ninja Theory just wanted to test your thoughts on who you'd help in that situation more than making you decide who lives or dies. If you had to choose between someone who could no longer fight for themselves and someone who could no longer see the path forward, who would you choose to save?

The post Should you help Fargrimr or Astridr in Hellblade 2? appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Should you help Fargrimr or Astridr in Hellblade 2?

articles.author: Madison Benson
articles.description:
Wuthering Waves' treasure chests feature all kinds of puzzles for unlocking them, from peculiar training dummy pillars to moving around mysterious repeaters to activate light block mechanisms. The Encryption Block puzzle is an example, requiring you to unlock a specific ability.


How to solve Encryption Block chest puzzles in Wuthering Waves


Solving the Encryption Block puzzle requires using the Levitator ability to move the Key Repeater pillars onto the blocks surrounding the treasure chest. Doing this causes the blocks to light up, and your objective is to get every block to emit light. Once each Encryption Block emits light, the chest will unlock, allowing you to claim its rewards.


Screenshot by Destructoid


You'll know you're looking at an Encryption Block puzzle when you see spiked pillars and chiseled stone panels on the ground surrounding a locked chest. Unlike other puzzles, you can levitate the pillars and move them onto the blocks, allowing you to see which panels will emit light when you place the pillar. 


Once you place each pillar on the Encryption Blocks, you'll unlock the chest and claim its reward. Typically, locked treasure chest rewards include Astrite, EXP potions, or character ascension materials. 


How to unlock the Levitator ability


If you encounter one of these puzzles before unlocking levitation, you'll first have to progress far enough into the main story to visit the Jinzhou city hall. Here, you'll meet with Sanhua and learn more about your current situation before venturing off to the next area. Before leaving, though, Sanhua will provide you with multiple character abilities, including levitation.

The post How to open Encryption Block chests in Wuthering Waves appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to open Encryption Block chests in Wuthering Waves

articles.description:
Almost every combat-heavy game offers controller support, allowing players to maneuver around the battlefield easily. However, you may have stumbled upon a roadblock in Wuthering Waves, where the feature may not be available. We're here to show you how to play on a controller in Wuthering Waves, including what devices are supported. 


Wuthering Waves controller gameplay, explained 


As of now, Wuthering Waves only supports controllers on PCs, not on mobile devices. I've tried it on Android to no avail, producing a mouse cursor on the phone screen with no inputs. iOS users have said the same thing, so PC controller support is the only way to go. 


Supported controllers for Wuthering Waves


Wuthering Waves is compatible with PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, and Xbox One controllers. Although I've heard some reports about PS4 controllers not being compatible, it did work for me. All you need to do is simply plug it into your PC to begin playing Wuthering Waves this way. 


If you prefer to connect via Bluetooth, you can do so by turning on your controller's Bluetooth mode and then searching for it in your PC's Bluetooth settings. Once connected, the game will recognize the controller and switch to controller mode. 


Head to Settings and select the Keys tab. You can tweak button inputs from here, including locking on a target, dash/dodge, and Resonance Skill. 


Screenshot by Destructoid


It isn't clear when controller support will be available for mobile, so you may want to stick with PC in the meantime. Kuro Game Studio has indicated that they are working on a gamepad feature, but it looks like it won't be entirely available for all platforms on launch.

The post How to play on controller in Wuthering Waves appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to play on controller in Wuthering Waves

articles.author: Kyle Hilliard
articles.description:
In an interview with his parent company on Sony.com, Last of Us co-creator Neil Druckmann talks about AI and briefly teases Naughty Dog's next game. Druckmann is expectedly vague about Naughty Dog's next big project but offers an enticing tease, saying, "I'm eager to see how this new game resonates, especially following the success of The Last of Us, as it could redefine mainstream perceptions of gaming."

The interview, however, primarily focuses on technology and how it improves and makes it easier for creators to tell unique stories. Regarding AI, Druckmann says, "AI is really going to revolutionize how content is being created, although it does bring up some ethical issues we need to address. With technologies like AI and the ability to do motion capture right from home, we're reducing both costs and technical hurdles, opening the door for us to take on more adventurous projects and push the boundaries of storytelling in games."

He also briefly touches on the future of The Last of Us TV show, citing that modern technology has allowed him to oversee the TV show's second season remotely from Los Angeles while it shoots in Canada.

You can read the full interview here. You can also read more about what is happening with the TV show's second season, including casting details, here.
articles.title: Neil Druckmann Teases Next Naughty Dog Game: 'It Could Redefine Mainstream Perceptions Of Gaming'

articles.author: Marcus Stewart
articles.description:
We’ve known since October 2022 that Season 3 of Netflix’s The Witcher would be actor Henry Cavill’s last as Geralt of Rivia and that Liam Hemsworth would don the silvery mane going forward. Today, Netflix released the first teaser trailer for Season 4 giving fans their first look at Hemsworth in the role.

Unfortunately, Hemsworth doesn’t speak in the brief clip, so we still don’t know how his Geralt voice compares to Cavill’s (or the games, for that matter). But he definitely doesn’t look out of place as the White Wolf and, hopefully, won’t be too much of a distraction in this new season.

Season 4 is currently in production in the UK and will be filmed back-to-back with Season 5, which will also be the show's finale. It has no release date but is speculated to premiere in 2025. These last two seasons will cover the three remaining Witcher books: Baptism of Fire, The Tower of the Swallow, and Lady of the Lake. The returning cast includes Anya Chalotra (Yennifer) and Freya Allan (Ciri). 

For more on The Witcher games, The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt got its official PC mod tools this week. Read all about it here.
articles.title: The Witcher Season 4 Teaser Provides First Look At Liam Hemsworth As Geralt

Last month, Utada released the re-recorded version of “Hikaru”, the Japanese version of “Simple and Clean”.

For more on what's to come for the Kingdom Hearts series, check out the reveal trailer for Kingdom Hearts IV and our interview with series creator Tetsuya Nomura about the game.

The footage hints at a location around the Lands Between that you and others will presumably visit.

Elden Ring's Shadow of the Erdtree DLC will be released on June 21 and will not be a standalone expansion. It requires ownership of the original game and will cost $39.99. A physical collector's Edition of the DLC package will also be available for $249.99 and will include a statue. For more on the game, including its last trailer and some additional story details, head here.

articles.author: Kyle Hilliard
articles.description:
Ghost of Tsushima, specifically the Director's Cut, is out on PC today. It's a fantastic game that should be welcomed with open arms as it makes its way to a new platform, but we were specifically curious about how it performs on Steam Deck. The game is not Steam Deck verified primarily because certain features are not supported on Valve's handheld, or other comparable mobile PC game platforms. However, the offline content (the single-player campaign and the expansion) has been specifically adjusted to play well on Steam Deck. You can read port studio Nixxes Software explanation here. And spending a little time with the game shows that the single-player campaign does, in fact, play well on Steam Deck. It's not without its shortcomings – a high-end PC or a PlayStation 5 are still the best ways to play the game – but Steam Deck appears to be a great way to play the game if that's your only option or you want a portable version.

You can check out some gameplay with commentary from myself and Wesley LeBlanc below.

Head to Game Informer's YouTube channel for more previews, reviews, and discussions of new and upcoming games. Watch other episodes of New Gameplay Today right here.
articles.title: How Is Ghost Of Tsushima On Steam Deck? | New Gameplay Today

articles.author: Marcus Stewart
articles.description:
The Casting of Frank Stone, the upcoming narrative horror game set in the Dead By Daylight universe by Until Dawn developer Supermassive Games, has its first gameplay trailer. The game was first announced at the 2023 Game Awards. 

The story unfolds in 1980 in the town of Cedar Hills, a town scarred by the murderous killer Frank Stone. It stars four friends who set out to create a horror film at a derelict steel mill dubbed Murder Mill. Naturally, that goes as horribly as you’d imagine, and players must survive by making choices that decide the characters’ relationships and fates. Sudden quick-time events can also be the deciding factor between whether someone lives or dies. 

Similar to Supermassive’s previous titles like The Quarry and the Dark Pictures Anthology, The Casting of Frank Stone can go down multiple paths based on your choices. Players will also solve environmental puzzles and gather clues to learn more about Cedar Hills

The Casting of Frank Stone still has no release date, but it will launch later this year for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, and PC.
articles.title: Dead By Daylight Spin-Off The Casting Of Frank Stone Gets Chilling Gameplay Trailer

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Netflix, Disney, Universal, and several other major Hollywood studios, have obtained a broad anti-piracy order in India. The High Court of New Delhi issued a dynamic+ blocking order targeting several pirate sites, mostly streaming portals. The order also requires domain registrars to suspend the associated domains and Namecheap appears to have already taken swift action in response. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Hollywood Takes Down Animeflix, Vegamovies and Others With Broad Anti-Piracy Order

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
A decision by Italy's Council of State, overruling the decision of a lower court that Google couldn't be held liable for displaying locally illegal advertising, is being welcomed by the head of telecoms regulator AGCOM. Massimiliano Capitanio notes that Google's defense failed the moment it became more than a passive host. "The same line should be adopted to eradicate piracy," Capitanio says.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Anti-Piracy Chief: Google’s Gambling Ad Liability Should Be Adopted For Piracy

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Most people agree that cheating is an unfair way to win at online video games, but do cheating tools actually break the law? This question is at the center of a landmark trial currently underway between cheat maker AimJunkies and Destiny 2 creator Bungie.  Among other things, the jury must decide whether the cheat maker infringed the game's copyrights.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Destiny 2 Creator Bungie & Cheat Maker AimJunkies Go Head-To-Head at Trial

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
The Market Court in Finland has just thrown out an attempt by a law firm to obtain the personal details of suspected BitTorrent users, without actually being a rightsholder of the works in question. After years spent representing movie rightsholders, the law firm felt copyright law should be interpreted as granting it rightsholder-like powers to obtain names, addresses, and similar information, without the rightsholders themselves having to be part of the action. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Court Rejects Law Firm’s Bid to Directly Obtain BitTorrent Users’ Identities

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Internet provider Cox Communication has fought several piracy-related claims in court over the past decade. In one of the lawsuits, against music rights group BMG, it chose to settle, presumably for millions of dollars. The company hoped that its insurers would help cover the costs, but after the companies declined, Cox is now back in court after suing them both.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Cox Sues Insurers for Failing to Cover Landmark Piracy Lawsuit

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
The Alliance for Creativity and Entertainment regularly 'seizes' domain names from pirate sites and services that have been persuaded it's in their best interests to shut down. However, the anti-piracy coalition officially reports just a tiny minority. During Monday and over the weekend, a batch of pirate IPTV domains came under ACE/MPA control adding to the flood of domains already commandeered in 2024.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Pirate IPTV Seller Domain Names Taken Over in Bulk By ACE/MPA

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Internet provider WOW has asked a Colorado federal court to dismiss an expanded piracy liability complaint filed by several film companies earlier this year. The ISP says there is no evidence to show that it received any piracy notices for the 300 new works added to the lawsuit. In addition, it believes that recent court verdicts support a dismissal of at least some of the claims in the multimillion dollar lawsuit.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: WOW Asks Court to Throw Out Filmmakers’ Expanded Piracy Liability Lawsuit

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
A major hire at the Motion Picture Association, to a new senior position that until recently did not exist, offers a glimpse into part of Hollywood's global anti-piracy strategy. Jesse Martin, former senior attorney at The Software Alliance (BSA), joins the MPA with a brief to combat and disrupt pirates' use of intermediaries. The MPA speaks of "intermediary outreach" and "voluntary initiatives" but if cooperation isn't forthcoming, preparations will have been made.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: MPA Ramps Up Efforts to Disrupt Pirate Sites’ Use of Internet Intermediaries

From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Top 10 Most Pirated Movies of The Week – 05/20/2024

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Sweden's Patent and Market Court sentenced a man on Friday for his part in the operations of popular pirate IPTV service, Viking IPTV. Long suspected of being the operator of the platform, the man was found guilty of violating copyright law and was handed a suspended prison sentence. In addition to payment of a fine, the man must also pay damages, with claims from movie and TV companies said to reach $1.8m.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Viking IPTV Defendant Avoids Immediate Prison But Faces Millions in Damages

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
YTMP3.nu, one of the largest YouTube ripping sites on the web, is trying to pinpoint competitors who allegedly sent abusive takedown notices to Google in an SEO battle. The company behind the site filed a lawsuit and previously obtained email addresses of the defendants. In addition, they now want Google, Cloudflare and Namecheap to share more information, including IP-addresses.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: YouTube Ripper Seeks IP-Addresses of ‘Threatening’ & ‘DMCA-Abusing’ Competitors

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
YggTorrent, the largest francophone torrent community, is no longer available as a public site. After going private, only registered users can access the site now. The change comes just a few weeks after new blocking measures were put in place in France. By going private and processing takedown notices, the site's operators hope to shake off their copyright troubles, at least as far as that's possible.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: French Torrent Giant YggTorrent Goes Private

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Japan-based publisher Shueisha is maintaining the pressure on sites distributing vast quantities of pirated manga content. A DMCA subpoena obtained at a United States court reveals around two dozen targets, some with relatively low traffic but many enjoying millions of visits per month. One stand out platform is currently ranked the 14th most popular site in Vietnam, period.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Shueisha DMCA Subpoena Targets Two Dozen Manga Piracy Sites

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Several major music labels, including Capitol, Sony, and UMG, sued the Internet Archive last year over its 'Great 78' phonograph archiving project. With hundreds of millions of dollars in potential damages at stake, IA filed a motion to dismiss, hoping to end the matter swiftly. The court, however, was not convinced.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Internet Archive Fails to Dismiss Record Labels’ Copyright Lawsuit

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Italian tech website Giardiniblog.it usually receives around a million visits per month. As of today, the 18-year-old site appears to have lost around 36% of its traffic after being permanently blocked by ISPs for publishing site-blocking workarounds. Following a legal appeal, AGCOM nullified its own blocking order, but the basis for blocking the site in the first place has mission creep written all over it.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Piracy Block Reversed For Tech Site That Reported Site-Blocking Workarounds

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
According to a new survey published by the Australian government, when internet users try to access any of the pirate sites blocked by their ISPs, six in every ten instantly give up looking for pirated content. Fifteen percent seek out content on legal platforms and a persistent one-in-ten dig in and attempt to bypass the blockade.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: VPN, DNS, Give Up, or Go Legal: Aussies’ Reactions to Pirate Site-Blocking in 2023

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Internet provider Frontier Communications must share the personal details of subscribers with movie and music companies, as part of two ongoing piracy liability lawsuits. The ISP previously redacted the sensitive information, citing privacy concerns, but the court finds that, with proper safeguards, the interests of copyright holders weigh stronger.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ISP Must Unmask Alleged Pirates But Rightsholders Can’t ‘Harass’ Them

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Since 2015, the Australian government has commissioned research to understand the level of online infringement and how that changes over time. The latest survey covering 2023 shows overall online content consumption, whether from legal or illegal sources, reached 78% of the population in 2023, up 6% on the previous year. Of those surveyed, however, 41% consumed content from illegal sources in 2023, up from 39% in the previous year.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Four-in-Ten Aussies Pirated Content in 2023, Overall Online Consumption Up 6%

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Copyright holders are repeatedly flagging IMDb URLs for alleged copyright infringement. Historically, these DMCA notices were mostly sent in error, flagging legitimate IMDb listings. More recently, however, the takedowns are being triggered by a persistent 'piracy' spam problem that tricks both rightsholders and opportunistic pirates alike.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: IMDb Struggles with Persistent Movie ‘Piracy’ Problem

articles.author: nospam@scummvm.org (djwillis)
articles.description:
Please welcome this year's participants!
On Wednesday 1st May Google announced the list of participants accepted for this year's Google Summer of Code and we are very happy to report that 4 contributors have been accepted to work on various parts of the ScummVM project this summer.
Now we have had a chance to dot the i's and cross the t's we are really pleased to welcome them all to the project and ask everyone to show them a very warm welcome as they get settled.
In no particular order, a heartfelt welcome to...
Project: Implementation of a Game Files Integrity Checking System for ScummVM
Chike Lee - Chico / InariInDream
ScummVM requires game data files to operate. Frequently, especially when copying from the old media, the files can be damaged. Thus, a system that could let the end-users…
articles.title: Google Summer of Code 2024 - drum roll please!

articles.description: Our players have played a lot of OpenTTD 14 since it was released a few weeks ago – in last week alone those who opted into our survey played 34,700 hours across 17,219 games. In all those hours, you’ve found some bugs, and we’ve done our best to fix them. The first maintenance release for OpenTTD 14 fixes a multiplayer desync bug and cleans up a few rough edges with the new ship pathfinder and the unbunching feature. As always, there are plenty of other bugfixes, which you can find in the changelog. Download Changelog Bug tracker
articles.title: OpenTTD 14.1
